release.change: Added clear button in search box
Fixed crash when ' was entered in search box
Fixed a small crash when enabled dictionaries were updated
Added option for sorting search results and for keeping screen on in app
Added plenty of improvements to speed up search
Fixed small bug where dictionaries where loaded each time from scratch for no reason
Minor changes to comply more with play stores "design for tablets" policy
If you have any crashes try clearing the apps data first and then opening it again
Added search for words based on a prefix/suffix with prefix* of *suffix or prefix*suffix
Cleaned up code a lot and fixed various minor bugs
Keyboard hides automatically when search begins
